properties.Non-point sources of pollution: Contamination of water in Beliul oya which is used by a large number of families with domestic waste and wastes from shops - Padiyapelella Town
properties.Recommended water quality improvement me:
Awareness program on how to disposal household waste properly and converting them to usable products such as compost
Introduce waste collecting methods and converting them into productive output with the mediation of Local Governments.
